description: Alrteration to roof pitch and rear dormer extension with installation of 3no front rooflights and associated changes to fenestration to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the proposed alteration to roof pitch and rear dormer extension with installation of 3no front rooflights and associated changes to fenestration to facilitate loft conversion would comply with condition B.2 (a) (similar materials) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated, on the balance of probability, that the cubic content of the resulting roof space of the proposed roof extensions would not exceed the cubic content of the original roof space by more than 50 cubic metres. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with paragraph B1.(d) (ii) of Class B of Part 1,  Schedule 2 of theTown and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposed roof extensions would comply with condition B.2 (c) (side windows to be obscurely glazed and fixed shut) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)
